labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Username gets raised with emote but the timestamp doesn't and it's silly
data.expected_result: Emoji height is same as message height OR timestamp is properly raised with username
data.short_description: Emojis being semi-enlargened while in compact mode (no scaling!)
data.steps_to_repro: - Switch to Compact mode in your appearence settings - Look at an emoji
